description:
As Mahmut regained his title of Pasha, he also became the Minister of Foreign Affairs. In order to attack Balt-Rhein economically, Mahmut and his team head to Aryiros. However, negotiations fall through as the head merchant does not wish to take sides with Torqye. Soon afterwards, Mahmut runs into Niki, a girl who just inherited her father`s merchant`s license, and he makes her a proposal.
Source: Amazon
